meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7717.

td.p: McKayle Bruce, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Paris Themmen, an entrepreneur from North Hollywood, California
Zach Dark, an investment analyst from Hoover, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,000)

tr.td: CONSTELLATION NAMES
IT'S TRADEMARKED
LITERARY GEOGRAPHY
EASTER
